bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Installing extension fails "Could not find project in current or any parent directories"
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>brian:brian/ $ deepforge extensions add deepforge-dev/deepforge-keras loading extension from: deepforge-dev/deepforge-keras /home/brian └─┬ deepforge-keras@1.0.0 (git://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge-keras.git#356f513c66312aa585a2530cbcea2b50f61fd65b) ├── webgme-autoviz@2.2.1 ├── webgme-easydag@1.2.0 └── webgme-simple-nodes@2.1.3 (git://github.com/brollb/webgme-simple-nodes.git#2a9fc79c93efd55067ef7c2e1559f9b31b0f97e5)
npm WARN enoent ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/home/brian/package.json' npm WARN webgme-autoviz@2.2.1 requires a peer of webgme@^2.0.0 but none was installed. npm WARN webgme-simple-nodes@2.1.3 requires a peer of webgme@^2.0.0 but none was installed. npm WARN webgme-easydag@1.2.0 requires a peer of webgme@^2.6.0 but none was installed. npm WARN brian No description npm WARN brian No repository field. npm WARN brian No README data npm WARN brian No license field. Could not install extension:
Error: Could not find a project in current or any parent directories at Q.then (/home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/webgme-cli/index.js:31:23) at _fulfilled (/home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/q/q.js:834:54) at self.promiseDispatch.done (/home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/q/q.js:863:30) at Promise.promise.promiseDispatch (/home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/q/q.js:796:13) at /home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/q/q.js:857:14 at runSingle (/home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/q/q.js:137:13) at flush (/home/brian/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.0/lib/node_modules/deepforge/node_modules/q/q.js:125:13) at _combinedTickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:131:7) at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:180:9) </denchmark-code>
